title: About Me
description: With studies in Software Engineering and almost three years of experience working in the industry, I've become a seasoned full-stack developer with a wide set of technical skills, as I'm able to adopt new technologies with ease. I excel in teamwork and believe communication goes a long way, I want to work with people that motivates me to challenge myself and expand my horizons.
text: I focus my work in auto-scaling distributed systems and infrastructure.
